name: Foxy
description:
FOXY :-    Entry to the "Community Game Jam".

-- To Be-Able To Enter The ScoreBoard You Will Need To Download The Game--

Thanks to all the youtubers who made this happen. 

This is my second Game Jam and second published game, All art and code was drawn/written by me, the music is called "Healing Water" and was made by David Renda. Hope you all enjoy. Please Rate and Comment FeedBack.
